text: The **Sykkyish Library (Level 3)** is the ultimate quiet zone. Open 24/7 during exam weeks! It has 50 individual pods with power outlets.
Need a vibe? **The Student Hub Lounge** has bean bags, lo-fi music, and is great for group projects. Open 8 AM - 10 PM.
**Block C Roof Garden**: Best for reading with a view. Wi-Fi is a bit spotty, but the sunset is worth it.
**MakerSpace (Engineering Block)**: Open for all students. text-to-image 3D printers and large tables for collaboration.
**The Main Cafeteria (Block A)** serves breakfast (7-10 AM), lunch (12-3 PM), and dinner (6-9 PM). Today's special: Spicy Chicken Wrap & Vegan Buddha Bowl.
**Bytes & Bites Cafe (Library)**: Best coffee on campus. Open 8 AM - 8 PM. They have a 50% off pastry deal after 6 PM!
**Night Owl Food Truck**: Parks near the hostels from 9 PM to 2 AM. Famous for their cheese fries and midnight tacos.
**TechFest 2026** is happening this weekend (March 15-17) at the Auditorium! Hackathons, robotics, and free pizza.
**Movie Night**: Every Friday at 7 PM on the Main Lawn. Bring a blanket! This week: 'Interstellar'.
**Career Fair**: Next Tuesday, 10 AM - 4 PM in the Sports Complex. Bring your resume!
**Block A**: Admin, Finance, and Computer Science Labs. Entrance faces the fountain.
**Block B**: Electronics, Mechanical, and the Dean's Office. Connected to Block A by the skybridge.
**Sports Complex**: Gym, swimming pool, and basketball courts. Gym hours: 6 AM - 10 PM. Student ID required.
**Health Center**: Located behind the Girls' Hostel. Open 9 AM - 5 PM. Emergency contacts available 24/7 on the app.
**Campus Shuttle**: Runs every 15 mins loop (Main Gate -> Hostels -> Academic Blocks -> Sports Complex).
**Bike Share**: Grab a yellow bike from any rack. First 30 mins are free for students!
**IT Helpdesk**: Ground floor, Block A. They can fix Wi-Fi issues and reset passwords. Open 9-5.
**Lost & Found**: At the Security Office near the Main Gate.
